nodes.text: Armorweave was a material used on various pieces of clothing, including capes, as armor. Count Dooku, leader of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, wore a traditional Serennian cloak made of armorweave. His apprentice, Asajj Ventress, also wore clothing made of the same material. Captain Phasma of the First Order wore a traditional armorweave cape that was representative of her command. Cardinal, also of the First Order, wore an armorweave cape.
